name: WORLD BUILDERz
description:
Go on an adventure to a personalised island!

A short, immersive 3D experience consisting of a questionnaire and a fictional terrain generator, where the player's answers are used as parameters to create unique spaces!

Controls

Credits
2D & 3D ART: Dolores Klasan & Jazmine Trinidad
PROGRAMMING: Annalise Valastro & Ithing Prayitno
MUSIC: Lou Tumalad

WARNING FOR MAC USERS
The Mac build is unfortunately more buggy than the Windows one; more specifically, the questionnaire portion of the project does not run on the Mac app, if it does at all. However, the terrain is fully accessible with default parameters—if you're willing to play around in a mini sandbox environment, please do give it a try!
